row.text: Fridericum imperatorem excipit „die dominico ante festum b. lacobi“. V. infra 12891, 12895, 12910; „Vigilia S. lacobi“, Bosonis card. vita Alex. p. 440, Hist. ducum Ven. in MG. SS. XIV. 83, Romoaldi Salern. Annal. ibid. XIX. 452, Relatio de pace Veneta ibid. p. 463, Chronica regia Colon. 1177 in MG. SS. XVII. 789, ed. Waitz p. 129: „IX. kal. August.“, Chronic. Magni presb. 1177 ibid. XVII. 503.
